statements: SELECT * FROM crop_growth_data;
SELECT crop_id, temperature, growth_rate FROM crop_growth_data WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM crop_growth_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT crop_id, precipitation, growth_rate FROM crop_growth_data WHERE temperature < 30;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM crop_growth_data;
SELECT * FROM crop_growth_data ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT date, growth_rate FROM crop_growth_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND precipitation < 50
SELECT crop_id, date, growth_rate FROM crop_growth_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM crop_growth_data WHERE growth_rate > 0.5 AND growth_rate < 1.0 AND humidity > 60
SELECT crop_id, temperature, humidity, growth_rate FROM crop_growth_data ORDER BY humidity DESC, temperature ASC
SELECT * FROM CropData;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM CropData;
SELECT field_name, location FROM FieldData;
SELECT crop_name, yield FROM CropData WHERE yield > 100;
SELECT field_name, soil_type FROM FieldData WHERE location = POINT(10, 20);
SELECT * FROM CropData WHERE yield > 100 ORDER BY planting_date DESC
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM CropData WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT field_name, location FROM FieldData WHERE ST_Distance(location, 'POINT(10 20)') < 1000
SELECT crop_name, yield FROM CropData JOIN FieldData ON CropData.crop_id = FieldData.crop_id WHERE soil_type = 'Clay'
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM CropData WHERE growth_pattern->>'type' = 'Annual' ORDER BY crop_name ASC
SELECT * FROM drones;
SELECT drone_id, drone_name, flight_date FROM drones WHERE drone_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, plant_date, harvest_date FROM crops WHERE harvest_date > '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM planting_strategies ORDER BY recommended_spacing DESC;
SELECT drone_name, flight_date, crop_name FROM drones JOIN crops ON drones.crop_id = crops.crop_id;
SELECT drone_id, drone_name, flight_date FROM drones WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE plant_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT drone_name, flight_date, crop_name FROM drones INNER JOIN crops ON drones.crop_id = crops.crop_id;
SELECT drone_id, drone_name, flight_date, crop_name, yield_prediction FROM drones JOIN crops ON drones.crop_id = crops.crop_id WHERE yield_prediction > 500;
SELECT p.strategy_id, p.strategy_name, p.recommended_spacing, c.crop_name, c.plant_date FROM planting_strategies p LEFT JOIN crops c ON p.strategy_id = c.crop_id ORDER BY c.plant_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CropData;
SELECT crop_name, growth_stage FROM CropData WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT farm_name, location FROM FarmData WHERE area_hectares > 50;
SELECT insight_id, analysis_date, insights FROM Insights ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, growth_stage, growth_data->>'temperature' AS temperature FROM CropData WHERE growth_stage = 'flowering';
SELECT * FROM CropData WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, growth_stage FROM CropData WHERE growth_stage = 'flowering';
SELECT farm_name, location, area_hectares FROM FarmData WHERE area_hectares > 50;
SELECT crop_name, growth_stage, growth_data FROM CropData WHERE crop_id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT insights FROM Insights WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Drones;
SELECT drone_name, drone_type FROM Drones WHERE last_flight_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT field_name, location, crop_type FROM Fields ORDER BY field_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_crops, AVG(growth_rate) AS avg_growth_rate FROM CropData GROUP BY field_id;
SELECT farmer_name, contact_number, address FROM Farmers WHERE farmer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Drones WHERE drone_type = 'Agricultural' ORDER BY last_flight_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT drone_name, drone_type, last_flight_date FROM Drones INNER JOIN CropData ON Drones.drone_id = CropData.drone_id
SELECT field_name, location, crop_type FROM Fields WHERE location IN ('Farm A', 'Farm B', 'Farm C')
SELECT farmer_name, contact_number FROM Farmers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY farmer_name ASC
SELECT field_id, timestamp, recommendation FROM Insights WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
